title: Inting player in LoL

embed.description: Post with 1 views. Shared by Tj2503. Inting player in LoL

body:
Check the match history and decide for yourself.
The player literally seems to be trolling/inting and unfortunately got him in one of my games
I reported but the player didn't get banned and played another 2 games after the game I reported.

Is this person inting?

replies.body:
watch the replay
look where he died

In chat he typed "I int now"

why am I getting random downvotes without any comments?

This person is straight up inting in peoples ranked games including mine and is not getting banned xdd

> [{quoted}](name=ooNerOoo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mLz22zUK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-06-04T15:29:33.116+0000)
>
> why am I getting random downvotes without any comments?
> 
> This person is straight up inting in peoples ranked games including mine and is not getting banned xdd

The downvotes are probably due to your post engaging in naming and shaming, which is against Boards rules. You didn't directly include the name in your post, but it's right there in your match history.

> why am I getting random downvotes without any comments?

Because sometimes it's easy to tell what kind of replies an OP is going to make to certain comments. You shouldn't be concerned with the meaningless internet arrows. People (myself included) use them to agree or disagree with a post when we have nothing better to contribute.

Yeah, but how could someone disagree with this post.
I don't understand how going 1/20 isn't intentionally feeding.
Also, they sell all of their items almost every single game.
nor should he be this concerned about whether or not one random troll gets punished
Certainly pretty strange final builds. Ya, I think I agree with Phoenix, that Brand game looks like inting.
wanna bet he will not get ban after in game report>?

> [{quoted}](name=captaincomando1,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mLz22zUK,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-06-04T22:48:08.727+0000)
>
> wanna bet he will not get ban after in game report>?

No. 

We're supplied with a one-sided account of this player's behavior, and only their final build. That's not enough information to make an informed decision on whether or not this player deserves punishment.

> [{quoted}](name=Periscope,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mLz22zUK,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2019-06-04T23:34:22.927+0000)
>
> No. 
> 
> We're supplied with a one-sided account of this player's behavior, and only their final build. That's not enough information to make an informed decision on whether or not this player deserves punishment.

You can get their build path from match history, as OP suggested. You could even look up the target's name in the client and watch a replay of their matches.

quick update
this player is still active and playing
why the hell is this slipping through the cracks
watch the reply on the brand game
he straight inted into them 20 fucking times in a row
It disgusts me that players like this get to get away with this kinda shit

dude, move the hell on

did you report him postgame? did you submit a support ticket if it was an egregious offense?

if yes to both, then your job is done. MOVE ON

you are wasting your time ON ONE RANDOM TROLL ON THE INTERNET

this is like trying to trim every blade of grass on the planet by hand

Right.

I guess inting is allowed because this is straight up ridiculous.
of course, I want to get this guy banned
he straight inted 4 games in a row, one of those games happened to be with me.

But whatever, I guess inting like this is completely tolerated.

> [{quoted}](name=ooNerOoo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mLz22zUK,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2019-06-05T11:50:57.932+0000)
> 
> I guess inting is allowed because this is straight up ridiculous.


when did I ever say this?


> But whatever, I guess inting like this is completely tolerated.

again, NO ONE IS SAYING THIS. All I'm saying is that obsessing over 1 random fucking troll is a waste of your time, but hey man if you want to beat your head against the wall over and over, I cant stop you

im done here, deuces{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

The 1-20 game almost surely gets him punished, that is just total mindless inting.

Could you show us a pic, where he has at least 2 played games after the Brand? It's very likely he got punished after that (sometimes there is a 20-30 min delay, thats why i asked for 2 games)
